name: Emerge (ShaunPrince)
description:
Find the bottle before the coppers arrive in this digital escape room set in a noir speakeasy.

Created as a quarter long non-curriculum project, for educational purposes only, by:
 Team Lead, Programmer, Designer - Shaun Prince

Producer - Aliyah Clayton

Gameplay Programmer - Aljon Vray

UI Programmer - Gavin Dent

Designer - Yi Luo

Audio Engineer - Jack Bueermann
